name: FocusLane
summary: Minimal pomodoro assistant for uninterrupted deep work sprints.
description:
## Focus without friction

FocusLane blends classic pomodoro timing with modern intent tracking. Plan a lane for the day, sprint through focused blocks, and review highlights in seconds.

### Highlights
- Lightweight daily planner with keyboard-first workflow
- Automatic context logging so you remember why a task mattered
- Review cards that surface patterns across your week

> FocusLane was built for makers who want peace and momentum without a sprawling project manager.

name: Syntax Forge
summary: Snippet-driven code playground with collaborative reviews.
description:
## Ship cleaner code together

Syntax Forge is a collaborative playground for quick prototypes, postmortem snippets, and bug reproduction. Share runnable sandboxes in chat, annotate lines, and export patches when you're done.

- Multi-runtime support (Node, Deno, Bun)
- Live reviewer cursors with inline suggestions
- Export patches directly to GitHub PRs

Bring your team into the same context without juggling windows.

name: PromptPilot
summary: Pilot prompts across models with structured experiments.
description:
## Iterate prompts with confidence

PromptPilot streamlines prompt prototyping. Define experiments, run them across multiple models, and capture outputs with metadata-rich trails you can compare later.

- Run experiments against OpenAI, Anthropic, local models, and more
- Track changes with reversible prompt history
- Share debrief boards for teammates

The cockpit for prompt engineers who love tidy artifacts.

name: Nimbus Tasks
summary: Calm task planner syncing seamlessly across every device.
description:
## Prioritize with clarity

Nimbus Tasks combines calendar-aware scheduling with a humane daily view. Capture tasks anywhere, drag them into focus mode, and keep commitments across the week.

- Natural language capture with smart parsing
- Gentle progress nudges and end-of-day wrap-ups
- Offline-first sync across mobile and desktop

name: PhotonCraft
summary: Non-destructive photo editor for teams shipping visuals fast.
description:
## Edit once, repurpose everywhere

PhotonCraft keeps source assets intact while you branch edits for campaigns. Define variations, annotate changes, and push exports directly to your delivery channels.

- Layer timelines with quick comparison sliders
- AI-powered masking tuned for marketing scenes
- Integrations with Figma, Dropbox, and Webflow

name: SoundCanvas
summary: Sketch ambient loops and export polished stems in minutes.
description:
## Paint with sound

SoundCanvas is a loop sketchbook for composers and podcasters. Drag shapes to sculpt ambience, tweak textures in a responsive grid, and export stems that line up perfectly in your DAW.

- Vector-driven arrangement grid with tactile controls
- Library of generative textures ready for layering
- Auto-normalized exports with smart fade handles

name: ScribePad
summary: Focused writing studio with tone checking and outline sync.
description:
## Stay in the rhythm of your draft

ScribePad trims distractions so you can write in flow. Outline once, sync structure across drafts, and review tone suggestions without derailing your momentum.

- Dual-pane outline and draft view
- Tone coach trained on editorial guidelines
- Publish-ready exports for Ghost, Medium, and Markdown

name: FlowLedger
summary: Cashflow intelligence for lean product teams.
description:
## Understand runway at a glance

FlowLedger ingests subscriptions, payroll, and ad spend to surface runway scenarios. Plan hiring, monitor burn, and share investor-ready dashboards instantly.

- Secure bank connections with granular controls
- Scenario builder for hiring and pricing experiments
- Alerts that highlight spend anomalies before they hurt

name: Arc Studio
summary: Storyboarding toolkit with collaborative feedback lanes.
description:
## Shape narratives together

Arc Studio brings story beats, mood boards, and feedback into one minimal workspace. Explore visual directions, stitch frames, and gather reviewer notes without chaos.

- Multi-user live feedback with version trails
- Mood palette panel for visual direction alignment
- Export to PDF, Keynote, or custom pitch decks

name: Palette Note
summary: Palette-aware note cards for designers capturing inspiration.
description:
## Capture palettes in context

Palette Note lets you clip color stories from screenshots, annotate them with typography notes, and organize everything in a grid that prints beautifully.

- Auto-extracts palette and contrast ratios
- Shared boards for team critique
- Export-ready templates for brand decks

name: MemoWeave
summary: Knowledge weaving tool that connects meeting notes automatically.
description:
## Threads that hold teams together

MemoWeave uses lightweight AI to connect meeting notes, decision logs, and action items. Jump between related threads, surface open loops, and keep teams aligned.

- Instant backlinks between meetings and projects
- Smart summaries for stakeholders
- Weekly digest highlighting unresolved decisions

name: DeckShare
summary: Share presentable decks with granular access windows.
description:
## Control the moment you share

DeckShare makes it effortless to share pitch decks securely. Schedule access windows, watermark slides, and get analytics when viewers engage.

- Access windows with auto-expire links
- Comment and feedback lanes for investors
- Export analytics into your CRM

name: QuickSprint
summary: Retro board tuned for async teams running fast iterations.
description:
## Retros without the ceremony

QuickSprint gives async teams a structured retro board that never feels heavy. Capture highlights, vote quietly, and share next steps with automated summaries.

- Templates for different sprint cadences
- Anonymous voting with frictionless facilitation
- Export retro notes to Notion or Linear

name: Atlas Radar
summary: Competitive intelligence with live company signals.
description:
## Stay ahead with live signals

Atlas Radar blends market feeds, job postings, and product release notes into a single pulse. Track competitor movements, assign owners, and ship responses while insight is warm.

- Signal scoring tuned for go-to-market teams
- Automated alerts in Slack and email
- Research dossiers to brief leadership quickly
